result.arabic_text: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةٗ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَاۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَٰلِمِينَ
result.translation: 81. Kaadu Nabii Suleymaanah hawwug iyya caacay kaah Qanne usuk (caacay kinnuk) maqaaneena elle barkattosne baaxô (Shaam Baaxo kinnuk) fanah kaa kee kaal luk yan mara yakkuqeeh gexa kay amrih, Kaadu nanu küllim naaxigeeh, nixxigga ummaan iimit maroh tan iyye Yalli.
